Title: Monsters

Synopsis: 
Six years ago, NASA discovered the possibility of extraterrestrial life in our solar system. Therefore, a probe launched into orbit to collect samples, but upon returning to Earth, it crashed on Central America. Shortly after the accident, began to appear new forms of life, and half the population of Mexico was quarantined. Today, the U.S. military and Mexicans are still struggling to contain a "creature" ... The action begins when an American journalist decides to escort a visitor through the infected area, to the U.S. border
